Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that compare non-autoregressive sequence generation techniques to other methods and explore different ways of generating sequences. These articles cover a range of topics, from text generation to speech synthesis and language modeling
Sequence-to-Sequence Learning with Neural Networks" by Ilya Sutskever, Oriol Vinyals
This paper introduced the sequence-to-sequence (Seq2Seq) model, which is a fundamental approach to non-autoregressive sequence generation

Neural Machine Translation by Jointly Learning to Align and Translate" by Dzmitry Bahdanau, Kyunghyun Cho, and Yoshua Bengio. This paper focuses on Seq2Seq models for machine translation and introduces the attention mechanism, which has since become a popular technique for sequence generation
Neural Text Generation with Recurrent Neural Networks" by Dzmitry Bahdanau, Kyunghyun Cho, and Yoshua Bengio. This article explores the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) for text generation

Neural Text Generation with Attention" by Dzmitry Bahdanau, Kyunghyun Cho, and Yoshua Bengio. This paper introduces the attention mechanism, which has since become a popular technique for sequence generation
